author: Special Correspondent
text:
There will be suspension of power supply in the following areas between 9 a.m. and 2 p.m. on Wednesday, January 13, as the Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation plans to undertake maintenance work at its Arasaradi sub-station:

Sammattipuram Main Road, Muthuramalinga Thevar Street, Sriram Nagar, HMS Colony, Doak Nagar, Theni Main Road, Virattipaththu, Pallavan Nagar, Mudakku Salai, VOC Main Road, EB Colony, Natraj Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Kochadai, Old Vilangudi, New Vilangudi, Jail Road, Ponnagaram West, Harvey Nagar, Gnanaolivupuram, Visuvasapuri, Arapalayam Bus Stand, ESI Hospital, Kailasapuram, SS Colony, North Gate, Arunachalam Street, Kambar Street, Jawahar Street, Chokkalinga Nagar, Ponmeni, Sammattipuram, Ponmeni Main Road, Pandian Nagar, Bypass Road, Bethaniapuram, Fatima Nagar, Income Tax Colony, Temple City Colony, Fatima College, Indira Nagar, Goods Shed Road and Meenakshi Bazaar.
title: Power shutdown on Wednesday
